review:
Dr. HariPrasath is a lifesaver. He saved our entire family during this COVID pandemic as everyone in our family was affected by COV 19. 

Doctor was kind enough to prepone the consultation understanding the situation and helped throughout.

Everyone in our family is in debt and we cannot thank enough for the support and timely assistance.

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

Excellent.  Doctor is very patient and comforting. Patient will feel 50 % healed just talking to him. The balance 50% healing he does with minimal medicines. He has not prescribed antibiotics or tests unless essential. He is well informed too and spends time with each patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
